title: Jake Smelley from Gideon
itunes:title: Jake Smelley from Gideon
description:
Let’s do this! I get really philosophical with this weeks guest, Jake Smelley, the drummer for Christian hardcore band Gideon. We talk about the S Town podcast for a bit as he was raised in that particular town, what it’s like to be on the hustle for 10+ years and a deep dive into faith and one’s ability to question their beliefs. Be safe out there everyone.Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
